1.16.5.1.1.0:
Enabled ownership of protected areas.
Added client<-->server syncing for better game play.
Consolidated commands into one Command class.
Display message to player if attempting to interact with a Protected block.
Update commands to require level 4.
Clean up.
1.16.5.2.0.0:
Add GUI Land Claim ability.
Refactored commands.
1.16.5.2.1.0:
Add config options to control what events/actions are protected.
Update to forge-1.16.5-36.2.20
1.16.5.2.2.0:
Fixed Large Claim display name.
Fixed Remove Claim display name.
Added Ops Permission level config option.
Change permission required for give command option to 2.
Update to forge-1.16.5-36.2.34
1.16.5.2.3.0:
Fixed Chests not being protected.
Fixed all events to check config ops permission level.
1.16.5.2.4.0:
Add client-side config option for enabling protection messages in chat window (default = false).
Limited right-click protection messages to 1 per click (check is called twice because of 2 hands).
